title: Problem 2147_D
statement: You are given an array a of n positive integers. Alice and Bob will play a game with this array. They will take alternating turns, with Alice going first.At each turn, the player must choose a value x>0 that appears in a at least once. Then, the player earns 1 point for each value x in the array, each value x in the array is decreased by 1 and becomes x-1. Note that the player can choose x only if it is present in a at the moment, so each valid move earns a positive amount of points. For example
